resources.string: Recent disappearances fuel the old legends.\nAny ship passing through these waters, gone without a trace.
Yet, into the heart of the storm we sailed, revealing a vast island in the darkness.\nWe tack for it now.
Our Captain has told us to expect hostility.\nLuckily for us, his secretive patrons have provided the finest of weapons.
As for me, I have little but my ambition.\nFate guided me on this voyage because I have rare skills.
I hope to make a name for myself as...
a Mercenary. My alliances and betrayals will shape history.
a Scholar. Soon, I will contribute my own verse to the knowledge of the world.
an Explorer, forever shrinking the boundaries of the unknown world.
a Rosicrucian. Who will one day lead the golden dawn of an enlightened age.
a Knight Templar. Seeking to unite the world with discovered truth.
a Huntsman. Determined to claim the greatest trophy of the New World.
a Farrier. Who will one day become the architect of grand achievements.
a Servant of the Red Sign. I will amass a legion to master the most prized resources of an emerging nation.
a Stowaway. I am a blank slate, ready to lose myself in a new life.
a Fighter. My blade, armor, and shield will guide me on my path.
a Sharpshooter. Light on my feet, and deadly with bow and firearm.
a Blacksmith. I can build anything, and, one day, will build everything.
My alliances and betrayals will shape history.
Soon, I will contribute my own verse to the knowledge of the world.
I will prospect and discover, charting the hidden sanctuaries and rare resources of this land.
Who will one day lead the golden dawn of an enlightened age.
Seeking to unite the world with discovered truth.
Determined to claim the greatest trophy of the New World.
Who will one day become the architect of grand achievements.
I will amass a legion to master the most prized resources of an emerging nation.
I am a blank slate, ready to lose myself in a new life.
My blade, armor, and shield will guide me on my path.
Light on my feet, and deadly with bow and firearm.
I have grown from apprentice to master. I am humble, but my skills carry me far.
The long-sought alchemical essence.\nThe fabled key to immeasurable power and immortality.
Its promise has drawn us here.
Few know of its existence and fewer yet understand it.\nThose who do, seek it at any cost.
Few know of its existence and fewer yet understand it.\nThose who do, seek it at any cost.
Few know of its existence and fewer yet understand it.\nThose who do, seek it at any cost.
Few know of its existence and fewer yet understand it.\nThose who do, seek it at any cost.
Few know of its existence and fewer yet understand it.\nThose who do, seek it at any cost.
Few know of its existence and fewer yet understand it.\nThose who do, seek it at any cost.
Few know of its existence and fewer yet understand it.\nThose who do, seek it at any cost.
Few know of its existence and fewer yet understand it.\nThose who do, seek it at any cost.
Few know of its existence and fewer yet understand it.\nThose who do, seek it at any cost.
Few know of its existence and fewer yet understand it.\nThose who do, seek it at any cost.
Few know of its existence and fewer yet understand it.\nThose who do, seek it at any cost.
Few know of its existence and fewer yet understand it.\nThose who do, seek it at any cost.
If we make landfall, we will have only our wits and determination to rely upon.\nWhether we meet friend or foe, we must be cautious.
May providence guide and protect us.
Respecs for your attributes and trade skills are free until Level 10
I am pitiless, but principled, versed in the art of mayhem, and loyal to the term of my contract. I am self-sufficient, but at ease as a member of a troop or campaign.
I am a pupil of mystery. I have burrowed through volumes in every palace of learning, collecting clues to forces both deadly and arcane.
This determines the equipment with which you begin your journey. It does not restrict what you can use.
I am one of the chosen, with privileged knowledge of the clockwork of the world. I unearth secrets, combine unstable elements, and bend them to my service.
I am the emissary of fate. I am the instrument of righteous fury, seeking the realm of the almighty, whether in the world we know, in the celestial firmament, or hereafter.
This determines the equipment with which you begin your journey. It does not restrict what you can use.
I have been an apprentice, a journeyman and a craftsman. I am humble, but my skills carry me far. I can build anything, and, one day, will build everything.
I am one of many. Others discover, I exploit. Others settle, I conquer. Others invent, I industrialize. I am unseen, but my presence is felt in all things.
I have left a world with nothing, to begin a new life with nothing. I have only determination, grit, and the willingness to earn what is offered.
This determines the equipment with which you begin your journey. It does not restrict what you can use.
Start at level 15 with Light Armor, both a Bow and Musket, and Rapier and Spear, stocked with health potions and food to ward Darkness.
This determines the equipment with which you begin your journey. It does not restrict what you can use.
You cannot change your name or appearance after this point.\n\nAre you sure?
Are you sure you want to leave character creation and return to the Main Menu?
Would you like to return to the Main Menu?
You will gain access to a choice of respawn locations later in the game.
Sprinting allows you to move faster.
Jumping allows you to move over objects.
Autorun allows you to sprint and traverse obstacles automatically.
Many resources can be gathered by hand.
Consuming food and drink restores health.
Drinking increases your stamina recovery.\nThirst makes you exhausted and vulnerable in combat.
You can equip armor, weapons, and consumables.
Drag or double click to equip the shield.
Drag or double click the Light Rations to equip to your Quickslots.

You have reached Aeternum.

Azoth lanterns introduce concepts which will help you survive.

Follow the path.
Azoth lanterns are indicated with blue markers. Each lantern introduces a concept which will help you survive in New World. Azoth droplets mark the swiftest path. Good fortune.
Reduces your nameplate visibility to other players.
Reduces your nameplate visibility more than crouching.
Crouching and going Prone reduces the visibility of your nameplate to other players.
You respawn at camp when you die.\nActivate your camp and place it.
You can respawn at your camp and towns you've visited when you die.
Eating replenishes your health recharge rate. Gather the berries, then open your inventory.
Press the Quickbar number to eat the berries.
Drag the berries to your Quickbar,\nthen close your inventory:
Consuming food and drink restores health.\nCooked food and drink are more effective.
Lock on to enemies by clicking the mouse wheel when in range. Use left mouse button to attack, right mouse button to block.

<font color="#ffffff"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Bold.font">Special Attacks and Dodges.</font></font>

Press F (by default) to use block breaking attacks to punch through defenses of a blocking enemy. Use Space + W A S D (by default) to dodge in any direction.

Blocking, special attacks and dodges all use stamina, so stay hydrated to keep ready for a fight.
Blocking, special attacks and dodges all use stamina, so stay hydrated to keep ready for a fight.
Disrupt enemy blocks with Heavy Attacks.\nHolding longer increases the attack's damage.
Press Q in combat to unleash a high damage special attack, but be careful, if you miss with a special attack you will be vulnerable for a short period after attacking.
This is your inventory.\nItems are stored here.
This is the paperdoll. Equip armor and trinkets here.
Loot the crate.\nEquip the item from your inventory.
View the items in your inventory.
Craft weapons and tools at your camp.
Ahead lies the land bridge to Aeternum. Talismans from defeated enemies are sold for coin at Outposts.
Some enemies are stronger than others. Their strength is indicated by the color of their name and the framing of their health bar.
Thirst and hunger will not kill you.
Click on the Sword to view the Mastery Tree for Swords.
Choose a skill from Sword or Shield Mastery Tree.
Click confirm to unlock the ability.
Active abilities will be automatically equipped if there are open slots.
You have <font color="#ffffff"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Semibold.font">{count}</font></font> unspent Mastery Point.
This content is not available in the prologue.
